explanation: intervention timing: year (time step) in which first intervention will take place
intervention timing: interval in years (time steps) between management interventions
share of total stand BA to be harvested
Minimum share of aalb before intervention below which it is exempt from harvest
Minimum share of apse before intervention below which it is exempt from harvest
Minimum share of fsyl before intervention below which it is exempt from harvest
Minimum share of pabi before intervention below which it is exempt from harvest
Number of cells to be aggregated into groups (1-4)
Initial number of cells as buffer between harvested groups (0-2)
relative weight attributed based on group's main species, higher weight to more abundant species
relative weight attributed based on group's BA, higher weight to higher BA
relative weight attributed based on group's weighted mean CR, higher weight to lower CR
relative weight attributed based on the share of regenration cohorts within a group, higher weight to more regeneration
relative weith attributed based on the share of regeneration cells among immediate neighbors, higher weight to less regeneration
